actions.value:
{{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Customer Service.

We are sorry to hear your item arrived in unsatisfactory condition and are happy to assist. We will be filing a claim with the shipping carrier on your behalf. To do so, we ask that you please complete our Lost/Tampered Package form and include pictures of the device and its packaging as it was received so that we may include this information in the claim.


Damaged/Tampered Package Claim Form
https://formcrafts.com/a/shipmentclaims



We have also created a return authorization for you to ship the item back to us. Please include everything received (packaging, device, accessories, packing slip etc.) with your order in your return package. It's very important that the original packaging from your order be returned to us as the carrier will ask to physically review the condition of the packaging.


Your Return Merchandise Authorization number and return address has been generated below:



Your RMA number (({{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}})) is valid for 15 days. Once the return arrives it takes 3-5 business days to process. A full refund or replacement will be awarded as requested. If the requested replacement is no longer in stock, a full refund will be provided. Item must be received by BREED before replacement or refund is processed

Please have your RMA number ready if you need to contact us by email or phone to check the status of your return.


Once the claim form has been completed, please return your item to the address below:

{{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}}

Breed Returns

{{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}}
20000 NE 15th Ct
Miami FL, 33179

Best regards,
Customer Service

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},

Thank you for contacting Customer Service.  

We are sorry to hear that the item you purchased is not up to standards. When a phone is locked and turned on, a screen will come up asking for an MEP Code; The phone will not go any further unless that code is provided. If you as the customer are able to be in the home screen of the phone and surf through the phone, then you are already passed the screen which shows the phone is unlocked. However, we would like to have your try all possible options to eliminate the current problem. The main reason for this is to try to get your item to work before having you have to ship it back to us. 

There may be many reasons why your phone is giving you this message. First, some sim cards lock themselves for the users' protection when they are removed from one phone. In order to ensure that the new phone will read the SIM card, please call your cell phone data service provider to make sure that your SIM card is not locked; giving it the capabilities to be read on the other phone.  If the phone is a dual-SIM card phone and is just stating that is not recognizing the SIM; the SIM card slot might be assigned to a different slot then the one being inserted to.

Please let us know if the issue was resolved, if not please let us know how to proceed with your claim, whether you prefer to start your claim for a refund or for an exchange. 


Thank you, 
Customer Service

{{ticket.ticket_field_114094139134}},


Re: {{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}} / {{ticket.ticket_field_114094157113}}


We have received your return. Upon inspection, we have determined that your device still has an Apple ID account that is requesting a PASSWORD in order to reset the device. As per our return instructions, this is an important step to ensure your return is processed in a timely manner.


In order to proceed with the return, we need to be able to unlock your device completely and we can accomplish this by either one of these options:


OPTION 1: Providing us with the password for the Apple ID account so that we may unlock the device and clear it back to factory settings


OPTION 2: Provide us a shipping label so that we can send the device back to you to unlock it and clear it without needing to provide us your personal credentials.

• We recommend using a carrier that can provide you a tracking number such as USPS or UPS.

• If you choose this method, you can upload the label electronically to this email.


Once this is complete, if you provide us the password for the Apple ID account, we will confirm that it is complete and the return processed.


If you send us a shipping label, we will confirm when the item has been packed up and sent back to you.


If we do not receive a response from you by {{ticket.ticket_field_114094818293}}, then your return will be closed out and no refund/exchange will be processed


Thank you

Customer Service

Once this is complete, if you provide us the Samsung email address and the password for the Samsung account, we will confirm that it is complete and the return processed.


If you send us a shipping label, we will confirm when the item has been packed up and sent back to you.


If we do not receive a response from you by {{ticket.ticket_field_114094818293}}, then your return will be closed out and no refund/exchange will be processed.


Thank you

macros.title: General Inquiries::"My Phone is Locked'
macros.description: Please use this macro to help customers determine if the device is locked or if the SIM card is locked

actions.value:
{{ticket.requester.first_name}},



Thank you for contacting Customer Service.


We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing difficulties with the device purchased. When a phone is locked and turned on, a screen will come up asking for an MEP Code; The phone will not go any further unless that code is provided. If you as the customer are able to be in the home screen of the phone and surf through the phone, then you are already passed the screen which shows the phone is unlocked. However, we would like to have your try all possible options to eliminate the current problem. The main reason for this is to try to get your item to work before having you have to ship it back to us.


There may be many reasons why your phone is giving you this message. First, some sim cards lock themselves for the users' protection when they are removed from one phone. In order to ensure that the new phone will read the SIM card, please call your cell phone data service provider to make sure that your SIM card is not locked; giving it the capabilities to be read on the other phone. If the phone is a dual-SIM card phone and is just stating that is not recognizing the SIM; the SIM card slot might be assigned to a different slot then the one being inserted to.


Please let us know if the issue was resolved, if not please let us know how to proceed with your claim, whether you prefer to start your claim for a refund or for an exchange.


Thank you,

Customer Service

Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Customer Service. We are sorry to hear you are having an issue with your device and are happy to assist. Please follow the instructions below to ensure prompt resolution of your return.


Return Merchandise Authorization Instructions


If you are returning any cellphones, tablets or watches, it is extremely important to completely remove ALL accounts, ALL passcodes, and ALL personal information from the device before you return it. If you are no longer able to power on the device, please use one of the below links to remove your personal information remotely. A simple reset of the device DOES NOT erase your information!


IMPORTANT: Any device(s) received locked with your information will be denied and returned at your expense with no refund submitted for processing.


**1. Remove ALL passwords from the device

o Screen Locks

o Account locks

o Any other passwords

APPLE OR IOS DEVICES


Factory Data Reset


>>Go to: Settings >> General >> Reset >> Erase All Content and Settings (If you have a screen lock and password, input when requested to complete the factory reset process).


If the device is not turning on, please follow the steps below to remove remotely:
